author: homi
title: Vietnamese-English BlockChain Video
description: ブロックチェーン技術の知識に関する資料は非常に少なく、そのほとんどが非常にわかりにくく、退屈なものです。

f6_assessments.q0: ブロックチェーンとカルダノについてより深く説明するためのyoutubeチャンネルを作り、コンテンツの半分を英語、半分をベトナム語にすることで、英語を話さない人にもカルダノに関するコンテンツの知識を提供するという、このチャレンジの目的を確実に達成することができる、というアイデア自体は良いものです。このチームは、すでにyoutubeチャンネルを持っており、そこでは、このテーマに関するコンテンツのほとんどがそうであると彼ら自身が主張しているように、ビデオが「退屈で難しい」ものにならないように、シンプル化、つまり、アニメーションで、よりわかりやすい言語でビデオを作ることを提案して、ビデオを投稿していると主張している。しかし、気になることといえば、このチャンネルは今作られたもので、このレビューを書いている時点では、最初の動画が投稿されたのはわずか4日前です。こうしてみると、開発しようとしている活動の経験があるとは言えないのではないでしょうか。また、アニメーションのビデオは、アニメーター自身ではなく、VideoScribeというソフトウェアによって生成されるという点も気になります。ソフトウェアによって作られたビデオの品質や繊細さが、そのソフトウェアを扱う人によって作られたものと同じであるかどうかはわかりません。youtubeにはすでにカルダノやブロックチェーンなどに関する英語の動画がいくつかあると思いますが、特にこのチャレンジが求めるものを考えると、ベトナムの視聴者向けのコンテンツに焦点を当て、そのような動画にも英語の字幕を挿入した方が有用なのかもしれません。要約すると、この提案は私たちが望む結果を底上げすることができますが、各ビデオをどのように構成するか、英語とベトナム語を半々にすることが本当に必要かどうか（私の意見：ベトナム語のコンテンツに集中する）、また、この作業をベトナムのコミュニティに公表する方法について、慎重に考える必要があります。
f6_assessments.q1: 提案書のこの部分は非常に詳しく書かれています。チームは、各メンバーの簡単な説明と、このプロジェクト以前の活動内容、どの地域でどのように活動していたか、また、全員の電報連絡先を記載しています。また、ビデオでカバーするテーマも提示されているが、私の意見では、プロジェクトを開始するには104本のビデオは多すぎる。目標をもう少し小さくしてもいいのではないだろうか。結局、15本のビデオにしか題材を与えていないのだから、英語とベトナム語で1本ずつなら30本になる。残りの74本はどんな内容になるのか。私は、この提案が計画通りに成功したら、ビデオの本数を減らすための資金をお願いし、F8の注文を更新するのが適切だと思います。このプロジェクトを実現するために、どのような頻度で映像を公開するのか（週に2本）、各チームのメンバーは何をするのか、という台本を示してくれているのは非常に好感が持てます。マーケティングプランについては、この部分には不満があると思います。ハンナさんが、このビデオをコミュニティで共有する」ということで、1500人の電報関係者には、このプロジェクトを知ってもらうことができますが、それ以外のベトナム人には、どのようにアプローチするのでしょうか。そのためには、資金の一部を広告費に充てて、誰かを雇って、自分たちが目指すターゲットにぴったりと届くような強力な広報活動を行う必要があるだろう。なぜなら、暗号の世界に関わるもののほとんどは、「大金持ちになる」という性質のものだからです。なぜならば、高額な利益が得られる可能性があることで新しい投資家を惹きつけようとしているからで、実際にそれは起こり得ることですが、カルダノのエコシステム技術はその約束を超えています。コミュニティと接点のないベトナムの人々は、このチャンネルの存在をどうやって知ることができるのでしょうか？融資金の分配については、誰が何をするか、何時間やるか、1時間の仕事のコストはいくらか、などを分担していて、結果的に1週間で345ドルが使われているので、問題ないと思います。この部分では、すべてが理想通りになっていると思います。あとは、1）ビデオの量（私の意見では非常に野心的です）2）電報のグループを超えて、このキャンペーンのマーケティングをどのように行うか、を回復する必要があります。
f6_assessments.q2: チームは、監査可能性の際にモニターするコンテンツを与えることを懸念していますが、それはあまり広範囲ではありません。私が提案したいのは、その国のコミュニティのメンバーが、ビデオが実際に投稿されているかどうか、ベトナム語のコンテンツにアクセスできるかどうかを監視し、その情報をコミュニティの他のメンバーに伝える活動をすることです。また、ビデオがターゲットとなる視聴者にどのように届いているのか、投稿数はどれくらいあるのか、その人たちはCatalystを通じて、あるいは別の場所で活動して、エコシステムに積極的に参加するつもりなのかなど、チーム自身がフィードバックしてくれると面白いですね。特に、以前分析した項目が詳細に書かれていたことと比較すると、監査性は少し浅いと思います。プロジェクトが望ましい期待に応えているかどうかを、私たちコミュニティの他の人々、特にベトナム語を話さない人々が理解できるように、また、この情報がデータや数字を通して私たちに伝わるように、チームはこれらの詳細を再検討する必要があると思います。

f6_assessments.q0:
What saddens me about this proposal is the problem statement. It is not true that there are few contents about blockchain technology. Nowadays have thousands of sources, channels, courses, etc. If the problem statement AND the solution focused only in the Vietnamese content I would not complain.

That said, in order to address better this challenge, I would rather focus only in the Vietnamese speaker, making videos only to them and reducing the overall budget. The challenge addresses the entry barriers based on language, therefore you should take it into account.

Other point that should be pointed out is that the metrics and goals are not well defined.  How many people are you expecting to reach with these videos e.g.
f6_assessments.q1:
All the videos and the translations are quite simple to do. I don't see any major barrier that demands great efforts to surpass. That said, I think that creating the content only in Vietnamese would be more useful and would allow the team to have more content in this language – not necessarily reducing the budget, but reallocating it.

In order to scale, how is the plan to monetize and keeping creating content or even increase the releasing rate, or enhance the quality of these videos?

Maybe investing some of the budget in marketing in order to reach more people would help it grow faster and will allow you to monetize.
f6_assessments.q2: Since the videos will be published on YT it's quite easy to verify if the proposal is being done. However I'm missing some metrics and validations. How many people are you expecting, which are the measurements? How are you going to validate that your videos are making people to effectively join the ADA community?

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal starts from a premissse that I'm afraid may not be completely true. There are plenty of content about blockchain and cardano in english already produced, even by other past funds. Furthermore, "boring" and "hard to understand" seem a little subjective, specially considering the varienty of material existing.

Maybe here, the best option is to focus on vietanemese language, both to make the project run quicker and cheaper. Only if videos are succesful in Vietnam, I'd consider providing them in eglish as well, but with subtitles in order not to have record audio again.

Another point that could've been highlighted here is how many people in vietnam use cardano and how many they intend to reach and engage, to give a more insightful perspective on the total potential impact. A communication startegy would also be welcomed as this content would compete with others.

Also, it would be nice to have a dedicated place (could be like an online portal) for Q&A and discussions.

As good points in the proposal, I liked the content is already defined and seems to cover good topics. It's also nice that its said here how he intend to overcome the "boredom" in the problem statement, even though its quite subjective
f6_assessments.q1:
There is a team of 3 people with experience in video producing and blockchain which seems to be enough to complete this project succesfully. There are links to other projects of theirs that seems to be a good reference to certify the information.

There's a solid plan and a clear budget breakdown. However, as I said in the impact that budget could be better leveraged if invested only in videos in vietnamese.
f6_assessments.q2:
There are milestones on video creating but no metrics related to them. It would be nice to see how many viewers should be expected and some way to measure their quality (surverys, number of likes, good feedbacks, etc).
It would be nice to see also how many new people joined tthe community because of the videos created.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer identified the problem that there are few resources about blockchain technology and that most of them are difficult to understand. As a solution, the creation of a YouTube channel to share knowledge about blockchain in English and Vietnamese was presented. The proposal presents a detailed plan of what will be done. The proposer does not present a plan to make the project sustainable in the future.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer identifies each member of the team and presents evidence of their experiences. The budget is detailed and appears reasonable given the timeframe and proposed work. The proposal presents a realistic deadline for completion of the work. The resources needed to implement the proposal are also described. The proposal does not appear to pose relevant risks for its implementation.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal presented a roadmap and KPIs that enable monitoring and evaluation of the proposal's progress and success. The proposer presents a clear description of the target problem and the proposed solution.

f6_assessments.q0:
In-depth knowledge about blockchain is often difficult to understand, so if it is not presented in easier and simpler methods, it will be difficult for people to access and understand it. I really like the solution of this proposal. Through the video of the proposal, I can see that the presentation is very simple and intuitive. With hand-drawn images on videoscribe software, it is possible to create very interesting content with images and attract viewers.
If content about in-depth knowledge about blockchain can also create attraction and excitement like content about dump and pump of blockchain projects in the crypto market, then Proposal can completely help everyone in the market. The crypto market becomes knowledgeable investors and will limit a lot of scam projects
f6_assessments.q1:
I am a member of this team's community. They have done a lot of zoom sessions sharing in-depth knowledge about blockchain. I am really impressed with the sharing of this team. They provide examples and detailed research on knowledge and projects. Everyone can completely review those shared zoom sessions on the youtube channel. I have no doubts about the team's ability to implement this proposal.
Besides, the proposal also gives a very detailed plan to make these knowledge sharing videos and the implementation tasks are assigned to each member with relevant experience for that job. These things help strengthen the feasibility of this proposal
f6_assessments.q2:
The implementation plan of this proposal is given very specifically by the team according to the volume and time to complete the work. Budget is clearly divided by job and video. Cost per hour: $15 is a reasonable number.
All of these works are auditable with videos completed and posted on the YouTube channel of the proposal. Therefore, this proposal is completely auditable

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal seeks to use English alongside Vietnamese to share blockchain knowledge with more people. This addresses the challenge very well. It is clear and concise.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has 3 members who have various skills in translation and video production, teaching , entrepreneurship and operation of stake pools.  The detailed plan explains that videos will be in animated form and contents of video among others includes; What blockchain is, what is Cardano, what is NFT?, etc. With all these details the proposal can be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The road map shows 12 months project work with 2 video sessions per week. The budget breakdown is comprehensive to make effective auditing. Good proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal target is to create a YouTube channel to share blockchain knowledge with animated videos both in Vietnamese and English. I can not say I agree or I disagree the proposal is impactful because the proposal addresses only 1/3 of the objectives in the challenge's success: Increase amount of resources in a variety of languages. It would not increase adoption and community engagement of Vietnamese speakers because the proposal does not set viewers as the target of the proposal.
As my reading, the only target of the proposal is the videos (It states through the proposal: in the problem statement, plan, solution, KPIs and budget). In my opinion, the team should care about how many people would watch the videos, how many feedback, how many people among these viewers become Cardano community members. That would raise the impact of the proposal and help to increase Cardano adoption in the specific region.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal provides type and number of team members with their roles in the proposal very detailed. The Youtube channel which has already built, shows the undoubtedly experience and skills of the team for the successful implementation. Personally, I like those 3 videos, they are not only easy understandable but also interesting about Cardano and blockchain technology. The plan is also very clear about what is being done and how to do.
However, it's all about the videos (number of videos, videos contents, how much cost for making videos,etc). I highly recommend the team re-set the target, and add information about viewers as expected, set the active viewers and their feedback in the success metric/KPIs. The team should plan how to attract people to access the channel, too. Because generally, the most important thing we care when creating a video (a channel) is how many views/viewers, isn't it? And in this case, the important thing community cares should be benefit for community.
In summary, I rate feasibility with a score of 3.
f6_assessments.q2: The idea and the work (which has already started) is very great. The KPIs of the proposal is very easy to see and to audit. By adding more 2 KPIs that I mentions above (number of views/viewers and number of their feedback), the proposal would become fully auditable. I believe the team will make it best in the next Fund. Now I rate auditability with a score of 3.

f6_assessments.q0: It can clearly be seen that there are plenty of channels which also educate people about Cardano, the proposal has emphasized the different in approach: using animation video. However it did not project a sustainable solution, because people cannot detect which information is up to date, which not. The suggested topics are also quite general, it might not get enough attention.
f6_assessments.q1: With the unclear unique selling points of the channel, we are not sure about the impact of the videos. The videos on the current channels has only few views, which not prove the potential of projects.
f6_assessments.q2: The information is not yet sufficient since the team did not show the connection and achievement in engaging with community (the number of members just say that there are plenty people attract in Cardano and investment)

f6_assessments.q0: This is a great proposition. It created a youtube channel to share blockchain knowledge with animated videos in English & Vietnamese to make it easy to understand. This proposal will surely attract a large number of users, especially those who use English or Vietnamese. Provide them with in-depth knowledge about blockchain in particular and the Cardano ecosystem in general, besides, great applications of blockchain in present and in future life will also be provided. Thereby helping the Cardano ecosystem to grow.
f6_assessments.q1:
After reviewing the team information provided by the proponent, I found that their team consists of members with full experience and knowledge, working in many different fields, with certain success, it makes project implementation much easier.
The plan provided is quite clear, the content of the videos is described in detail, mainly the background knowledge about blockchain and Cardano. However, how many minutes is each posted video? Should provide more criteria to evaluate the success, for example: the number of viewers, the number of positive comments, ...
The budget allocation is quite reasonable (hours worked, amount per hour,...) this helps the project to be sustainable over time.
Overall, with the team information and plan provided, I think the project is doable!
f6_assessments.q2:
The information provided is relatively complete, creating a solid basis for everyone to monitor and evaluate its success. However, it is necessary to add a few contents as I mentioned in the previous section (success assessment indicators, ...)
Because of the results this proposal brings, I hope it will be implemented successfully. In the future, I think it should not stop at English-Vietnamese, but should aim at more languages (languages commonly used in the Cardano community: Spanish, Japanese,...)

solution: ブロックチェーンの知識を共有するためのyoutubeチャンネルを作成し、英語＆ベトナム語のアニメーション動画でわかりやすく説明しています。
experience: 私たちのチームは、プロジェクトの分析やカルダノや他のブロックチェーンに関する知識について、コミュニティに向けて多くのウェビナーを行ってきました。
